titleStmt.title: A large and particular relation of the affairs of Ireland in a letter to a person of honour / from a gentleman at Chester who came from Dublin, June 26, and arrived here July 1, 1689.
titleStmt.author: J. M.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reels 817:13 and 1289:19.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
